code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a white male aged 74 years with C/O severe seeing halos around the light, severe frontal headache and severe nausea. Denies ever using tobacco he reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 177 cm, Weight 60.9 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

content2.Unmatched: Denies ever using tobacco he reports having no more than one drink a day

tr.td: University Ears Nose and Throat Specialists

td.content: s:pt presents with severe frontal headache, severe nausea, severe seeing halos around the light and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat for 5 days. he has a history of Glaucoma for past 1 year. he is a male retired aged 74 ys. he reports having no more than one drink a day he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 178 cm, Weight 62.1 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 16 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Vision Test.

content2.Unmatched: he reports having no more than one drink a day he denies ever using cigarettes

td.content: s:patient presents with 4 days history of mild deterioration of eye sight and mild problem with seeing at night. he is a white male retired aged 75 ys. he denies ever using cigarettes occasional EtOH o:Height 177 cm, Weight 61 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

content2.Unmatched: he denies ever using cigarettes occasional EtOH
